title: DIH JdbcDataSource - improve extensibility part 2
description: This is a follow up to SOLR-8616. Due to changes in SOLR-8612 it's now no longer possible without additional modifications to use a different ResultSetIterator class. The attached patch solves this.

comments.author: Mikhail Khludnev
comments.content: TODO add the test attached to SOLR-9256
